# Loading df
```{r}
df <- read_excel("/Users/counterpartventures/Desktop/Data/Survey Data 7.3.2024 V1.18.xlsx", 
                     sheet = "Master Data")

df <- df %>%
  mutate(mandate_based_on_22 = case_when(
    strategic_financial_from_22 < 4 ~ "Strategic",
    strategic_financial_from_22 >= 4 & strategic_financial_from_22 <= 7 ~ "Hybrid",
    strategic_financial_from_22 > 7 ~ "Financial"
  ),
  mandate_based_on_24 = case_when(
    strategic_financial_from_24 < 4 ~ "Strategic",
    strategic_financial_from_24 >= 4 & strategic_financial_from_24 <= 7 ~ "Hybrid",
    strategic_financial_from_24 > 7 ~ "Financial"
  )
  )

```
